item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation go get github.com/yanzay/tbot/v2 Usage Simple usage example: package main import ( "log" "os" "time" "github.com/yanzay/tbot/v2" ) func main() { bot := tbot.New(os.Getenv("TELEGRAM_TOKEN")) c := bot.Client() bot.HandleMessage(".*yo.*", func(m *tbot.Message) { c.SendChatAction(m.Chat.ID, tbot.ActionTyping) time.Sleep(1 * time.Second) c.SendMessage(m.Chat.ID, "hello!") }) err := bot.Start() if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } } Examples Please take a look inside examples folder.
